---
title: "‚úçüèº Blog"
# Configuration for listing blog posts
listing:
  - id: blog
    contents: blog  # Directory containing the blog posts
    sort: "date desc"  # Sort posts by date in descending order
    type: grid  # Display posts in a grid layout
    categories: unnumbered  # Do not number categories
    sort-ui: false  # Disable sort user interface
    filter-ui: false  # Disable filter user interface
    feed: true  # Enable RSS feed for the blog
    fields:  # Fields to display in the blog listing
      - title
      - subtitle
      - categories
      - date
      - reading-time
      - image
page-layout: full  # Use full page layout for the blog
title-block-banner: true  # Enable title block banner
include-after-body: "footer.html"
description: "Catatan pena ku berkaitan isu semasa dan info menarik."
---
